title: Fourth Wing Characters
description: How well do you know the characters of Basgiath?

questions.question: Who is Xaden Riorson?

options.text: The wingleader and a rebellion leader's son

questions.explanation: Xaden Riorson is a fourth-year wingleader and the son of the executed rebellion leader Fen Riorson.

questions.question: Who is Violet's best friend at Basgiath?
questions.explanation: Rhiannon becomes Violet's closest friend and squadmate at Basgiath War College.

questions.question: Dain Aetos is Violet's childhood friend.
questions.explanation: Dain and Violet grew up together, and he initially tries to protect her at Basgiath.

questions.question: What is Mira Sorrengail's relationship to Violet?
questions.explanation: Mira is Violet's older sister who is already an accomplished dragon rider.

questions.question: Who is Liam Mairi?

options.text: Xaden's best friend assigned to protect Violet

questions.explanation: Liam is Xaden's close friend who is assigned to watch over and protect Violet.

questions.question: What distinguishes the children of the rebellion leaders?

options.text: They have rebellion relics tattooed on them

questions.explanation: The marked ones, children of rebellion leaders, are forced to wear rebellion relics as tattoos that can kill them.

questions.question: Violet's father is still alive at the start of the book.
questions.explanation: Violet's father died before the events of Fourth Wing, and his death deeply affected her.

questions.question: Who is Professor Kaori?
questions.explanation: Professor Kaori teaches cadets about their signets (magical abilities gained from dragon bonds).
